entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as someone who is slowly savoring words and has a heavy sigh later in the conversation. He is also mentioned to have ruffled hair.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as someone who is bitter and seems to be disappointed when Ron asks if he watched him make saves.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as the one who got the Snitch right out from under Chang's nose.

entities.name: chang
entities.description: Chang is described as someone whose face showed a look of shock when Ginny got the Snitch.

entities.name: davies
entities.description: Davies is mentioned as the one who scored the first goal in the match that Harry and Hermione saw.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as someone who puts down her book and looks at Ron apologetically when she corrects him about not watching the match.

relationships.description: Ron is disappointed that Harry did not watch him make saves.
Hermione apologizes to Ron for correcting him about not watching the match.
